description:
When Soma arrives at the gate of the third challenge, the organizer of BLUE, who is also the head of WGO, tells him that she has no expectations for the normal chefs like him.
The underground chefs show off their culinary skills in order to prove how powerful they really are. One of the chosen chefs takes out a cooking tool which turns out to be a chainsaw!
Soma and the others witness the unusual yet undeniable skills of the underground chefs. Will they be able to counter them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: عيد ميلاد مجيد في منتصف الصّيف
